How many people are affected by Coffin-Siris syndrome ?,Coffin-Siris syndrome is a rare condition that is diagnosed in females more frequently than in males. Approximately 140 cases have been reported in the medical literature.,GHR,Coffin-Siris syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Coffin-Siris syndrome ?,"Coffin-Siris syndrome is caused by mutations in the ARID1A, ARID1B, SMARCA4, SMARCB1, or SMARCE1 g
